text: Table I: Classification of hypertension (all values are inmmHg) Category Systolic arterial Diastolic arterial blood pressure blood pressure (SBP) (DBP) Optimal <120 and <80 Normal <130 and <85 High normal 130-139 or 85-89 Hypertension Stage 1:Mild 140-159 or 90-99 Stage 2:Moderate 160-179 or 100-109 Stage 3:Severe 180-209 or 110-119 Stage 4: Very severe >210 or >120 Isolated systolic hypertension >140 and <90 Pulse pressure hypertension >80 Note: The South African Hypertension Society only recognises upto Stage 3,4but the other grades are useful for perioperative decisions.
